title: Skellam Processes via Multiparameter Poisson Process
summary: This paper introduces a multiparameter version of the Skellam point process through multiparameter Poisson processes. It details its distributional properties, derives its compound representation for a specific case, and obtains a closed expression for the characteristic function of its Riemann integral over a rectangle. A different version of the multiparameter Skellam process is also introduced, with a weak convergence result derived.
usefulness_reason: The title explicitly mentions "Skellam point process" and "multiparameter Poisson processes", which are direct forms of "Point Process". The "multiparameter" aspect implies spatio-temporal or multi-dimensional characteristics, making it highly relevant to "Spatio Temporal Point Process".
